name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D】生演奏！？楽しんだもん勝ちのBANDLIVE！【#常闇トワ1周年記念】 [TjhOZn1vNW4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performs a cover of 'Kawaki wo Ameku' by Minami.
Tokoyami Towa performs a cover of 'Gira Gira' by Ado.

subtitles.original: カワキをアメク
subtitles.english: Crying for Rain

subtitles.original: 窓を越して　話を止めよう
subtitles.english: Stop talking through the window.

subtitles.original: 行き止まり　最低で　運命に　もじらないでどうぞ
subtitles.english: A dead end, the worst, please don't play with fate.

subtitles.original: いじらないでどうぞ
subtitles.english: Please don't mess with it.

subtitles.original: 変な安堵状は　何度目？　もう僕なら
subtitles.english: How many times for this strange letter of relief? If it's me...

subtitles.original: 脆いセンス広げる　その方が魅力的でしょう？
subtitles.english: Spreading a fragile sense, isn't that more attractive?

subtitles.original: 愛でた　変えられないなら　放っといてくれ
subtitles.english: If what I loved can't be changed, then leave me alone.

subtitles.original: 迷えるなら　そっとしてくれ
subtitles.english: If I can wander, then leave me be.

subtitles.original: 肝心なところは　筒抜けで
subtitles.english: The essential parts are leaking out.

subtitles.original: 安心だけは　させられるような
subtitles.english: As if you could make me feel safe.

subtitles.original: 甘い雨が降れば
subtitles.english: If sweet rain falls...

subtitles.original: 傘も差したくなるだろう
subtitles.english: You'll want to hold an umbrella, right?

subtitles.original: このまま　大切なことは　何だっけ？
subtitles.english: Just like this, what was the important thing again?

subtitles.original: 目を瞑って　たかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to keep my eyes closed.

subtitles.original: 言の葉　無くした　巻き戻せなかった
subtitles.english: Words lost, couldn't rewind.

subtitles.original: 今　雨止めないで
subtitles.english: Right now, don't stop the rain.

subtitles.original: 止む
subtitles.english: Stops.

subtitles.original: 雨傘を閉じて　濡れて帰ろう
subtitles.english: Close the umbrella and go home soaked.

subtitles.original:
ギラギラ
作詞・作曲：てにをは
subtitles.english:
Gira Gira
Lyrics & Composition: Teniwoha

subtitles.original: 嗚呼　本当になって　素晴らしき世界
subtitles.english: Ah, becoming real, what a wonderful world.

subtitles.original: ねぇもまた　己の醜悪さに　惑う
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm wandering in my own ugliness again.

subtitles.original: だのに人好きで　想う気持ちだけは
subtitles.english: And yet, I like people, and just these feelings...

subtitles.original: 一丁前にあるから　悶えるんでしょう
subtitles.english: ...are so fully grown that they make me writhe.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼　虹を弾いて　私の顔は
subtitles.english: Ah, repelling the rainbow, my face...

subtitles.original: 神様が左手で　描いたみたい
subtitles.english: ...looks like God drew it with his left hand.

subtitles.original: 必然　この世にあるラブソングは　どれ一つ
subtitles.english: Inevitably, not a single love song in this world...

subtitles.original: 絶対　私向けなんかじゃないでしょう
subtitles.english: ...is definitely meant for me, right?

subtitles.original: 使い道のない　口づけ
subtitles.english: A kiss with no use.

subtitles.original: 憐れみを　欲しいままに
subtitles.english: Indulging in pity.

subtitles.original: スポットライトに　歌われ身を守る
subtitles.english: Sung to by the spotlight, protecting myself.

subtitles.original: 愛されないくらいなんだ
subtitles.english: So what if I'm not loved?

subtitles.original: ギラギラ輝いて　私は夜を呑む
subtitles.english: Glittering brightly, I swallow the night.

subtitles.original: ラップ・タップ・タップ・タップ　今に見テロ　このLOVE
subtitles.english: Rap tap tap tap, just you watch, this LOVE.

subtitles.original: 噛み締める唇　裏の鼓動ビートル
subtitles.english: Biting my lip, the heartbeat inside like a beetle.

subtitles.original: オー・オー・オー　なんて不気味　この世は美だ
subtitles.english: Oh-oh-oh, how eerie, this world is beauty.

subtitles.original: ギラ　ギラギラ　ギラ
subtitles.english: Gira, gira-gira, gira

subtitles.original: 嗚呼　お釈迦様も　存ぜぬうちに
subtitles.english: Ah, even Buddha, while he wasn't looking.
